document.docTitle: Nocaracris furvus subsp. furvus Mistshenko 1951, comb. nov.
document.masterDocTitle: Pamphagidae (Orthoptera: Acridoidea) from the Palaearctic Region: taxonomy, classification, keys to genera and a review of the tribe Nocarodeini I. Bolívar

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Pamphagidae (Orthoptera: Acridoidea) from the Palaearctic Region: taxonomy, classification, keys to genera and a review of the tribe Nocarodeini I. Bolívar

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Nocarodes cyanipes Fisch
de W.:
Werner 1901 : 282
, partim.

Nocaracris burri obscurata
n. subsp. :
Ramme 1951 : 300
, 427. syn. nov.

Nocaracris burri obscurata Ramme, 1951
:
Karabağ 1958 : 120
;
Otte 1994 : 172
.

paragraph.materialsCitation:
Type locality.
Turkey : İzmir , Bozdağ.
Holotype :
male ( ZIN ).

subSubSection.paragraph:
Material examined.
TURKEY : Anatolien , 1869, 1♂ ( Holotype ) (leg. Lederer ) ( ZIN )
;
Asia Minor , [ İzmir ], Odemis , Mt. Bos Dagh [ Bozdağ ], c.
5500 ft
,
27.6.1938
, 1♂ ( Holotype of
Nocaracris burri obscurata
), 2♂ , 2♀ ( Paratypes of
Nocaracris burri obscurata
) (leg. R. E. Gathorne-Hardy ) ( NHMUK )
;
Anatolia , Odemis [ Ödemiş ], Boz dag,
1300–1900 m
,
16.8.1950
, 1♀ (leg. P. H. Davis ) ( NHMUK )
;
İzmir , Bozdağ ,
1500–2000 m
,
12.6.2014
, 6♂ , 2♀ , plus 2♂ , 1♀ in alcohol (leg. M. Ünal , A. G. Bugrov & I. E. Jetybayev ) (AİBÜEM)
;
Denizli , Babadağ ,
1580– 1600 m
,
13.6.2014
, 10♂ , 3♀ , plus 4♂ , 1♀ in alcohol (leg. M. Ünal , A. G. Bugrov & I. E. Jetybayev ) (AİBÜEM); [ İzmir ], Bos-Dagh [ Bozdağ ], 1♂ (leg. Lederer ) (det. Cejchan , 1967 as
Paranocaracris burri obscurata
) ( NMW )
;
Bos-Dagh b. Smyrna [ Bozdağ , İzmir ], 2♀ (leg. Lederer ) (det. Br. v.W. as
Nocarodes cyanipes
) (det. Ramme as
Nocaracris burri
and det. Cejchan , 1967 as
Paranocaracris burri obscurata
) ( NMW )
;
Amasia , 1♂ (det. Ramme as
Nocaracris burri
) ( NMW )
.
Distribution. W. Turkey : İzmir : Bozdağ, Denizli : Babadağ ( Fig. 843 ).

Remarks. Mistshenko (1951a: 520) described this species from one male from Anatolia without exact locality. Demirsoy (1973 : 414; 1977: 66) recorded and described one female from Ersis, Artvin province in N.E
. Turkey.
According to Salman (1978: 66) the female recorded by Demirsoy is a nymph of
Paranocaracris elegans Mistshenko
and thereby
Oronothrotes furvus
might be a synonym of
P. elegans
. Both authors assumed that
Oronothrotes furvus
is found in the northeastern end of Turkey . On the other hand Ramme (1951: 300) described
Nocaracris burri obscurata Ramme, 1951
with both sexes from Bozdağ, İzmir Province , W
. Turkey.
The study on the type material of
N. burri obscurata
in the NHMUK allowed to ascertain that it is certainly conspecific with
Oronothrotes furvus
. Thus the exact location of this species appeares to be in the western end of Turkey , contrary to previous expectations.
Mistshenko (1951a)
has the priority
over Ramme
(1951) (see Material methods). There are several specimens in the NMW (see Material examined) collected by Lederer from Bozdağ
,
İzmir . Very probably the holotype of this species collected by Lederer ( ZIN ) was also found in Bozdağ
,
İzmir . Moreover I have collected the typical forms of this species from Bozdağ. Therefore I propose the type locality of this species is Bozdağ, in İzmir Province of Turkey
.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Nocaracris burri obscurata Ramme, 1951
was overlooked by Demirsoy (1973 , 1977 ) and Presa & Garcia (1983) . Although no author published this subspecies as “
Paranocaracris rubripes obscurata ( Ramme, 1951 )
”
Eades et al. (2016)
gave it in this combination.

Ramme (1951) in describing
N. burri obscurata
did not mention its tympanum despite the type specimens have distinct tympanum. He distinguished it from
N. burri
by the coloration.

One male from Amasya agrees with this species, it is impossible to be in Amasya province , the label must be mistakenly attached (see also the Remarks sections of
P. straubei
and
N. burri
).
